Description: Large fragment of rim and bowl of black-glazed pottery lekanis with reflex strap handle, probably Attic; square rim, offset on outside; wholly glazed; three bands in added red on inside.
Curator's comments: Clay suggests an Attic rather than East Greek, or other, origin.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2197)
